basic.description:
Research and studies in relations of media, technology, and culture. Critical examination of cultural and communication technologies and the employment of technology within selected examples from film, television, and digital media.
NOTE    Also offered online. Consult Continuing and Distance Studies. Learning Hours may vary.
basic.subject: FILM
basic.title: Culture and Technology

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite       (FILM110 or FILM240 or FILM260) and a GPA of 2.60.
